metadata.title: CVE-2019-2110 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In ScreenRotationAnimation of ScreenRotationAnimation.java, there is a possible capture of a secure screen due to a missing permission check. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-9Android ID: A-69703445

criterions.comment: android-framework-23 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
